column5: of delray beach passed away june 19th
column6: 2015. beloved husband of the late evelyn; father of barbara hoodack and ruth schnell; grandfather if david
column8: stuart and douglas and seven great grandchildren; brother of the late irving and the late rose. chapel service to be held at beth israel memorial chapel in delray beach on monday
column10: 2015 at 2:15 p. m. interment to follow at eternal light memorial gardens in boynton beach. shiva will take place following the service donations may be made to the alzheimers society. upcoming events. chapel service. jun 22. 2:15 pm beth israel delray beach chapel5808 west atlantic avenue. delray beach
